parameters: Hmm? Did Nono put this doll over here?
Would you like to save the game?
Let's explore the lobby some more.
Let's explore the lobby some more.
Let's explore the lobby some more.
Hold on, that doesn’t look like my house at all!
\C[0]heck, everything is wrong since I arrived here!
Ugh, it reminds me of my high school days!
Being hunted by a \C[2]demon\C[0] wasn’t fun, y’know?
I’m sure we’ll find answers as we go.

Did you notice the \C[1]\I[7]Likeness\C[0] feature on the main menu?
It shows how much \N[1] favours you!

Increase her \C[1]\I[7]Likeness\C[0] towards you in order to find out
the entire truth!

How? I’ll leave that to you to find out! \N[1] loves a good puzzle,
and even more a person who’s capable of solving them!
There’s a note on the door.

Find the three missing pieces of the necklace
and place them on the altar to leave this space.
A puzzle, huh? There’s no choice but to solve it!
The choice of words is peculiar, though.\.
